alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 4:01PM CST until March 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: .OVERVIEW...a wintry mix spreads across the area late tonight, quickly transitioning to freezing rain overnight. Ice will accrue on untreated surfaces, making travel hazardous to dangerous...potentially impossible in some areas. Travel is highly discouraged along and north of I-94 overnight into Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected with ice accumulations from a trace to up to 2/10". * WHERE...Jackson County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
